name: Snake: DOS Edition
description:
Everyone knows snake. It's a cute little game made in 1976 by gremlin industries featuring a snake that slithers around and eats whatever it comes across.

This version was made for the command prompt, it's a little sideproject i scrapped together in a couble of days, and i'm quite happy of the way it turned out.

<back

-Released the game
